title: Sophie Grégoire Trudeau - Wikipedia
snippet: Sophie Grégoire Trudeau (French pronunciation: [sɔfi ɡʁeɡwɑʁ]; born April 24, 1975) is a Canadian public speaker and retired television host. She married Justin Trudeau, the 23rd prime minister of Canada, in 2005; the couple separated in 2023.

title: Sophie Grégoire Trudeau 're-partnered' with Ottawa doctor, ex-wife claims in divorce petition
